deal_id: 10-night Fly, Stay & Cruise: Hawaiian Islands - SAVE $3800*pp
title: 10-night Fly, Stay & Cruise: Hawaiian Islands - SAVE $3800*pp
inclusions_evidence: Return economy class airfares from Auckland to Honolulu with Air New Zealand
2 nights pre-cruise and 1 night post-cruise accommodation in Waikiki at the Outrigger Waikiki Beachcomber
7-night cruise with NCL on Pride of America in an inside stateroom, twin share

other.notes: Cruise price is based on similar offerings found on NCL's website.

reasoning: The travel agency deal is significantly cheaper than the DIY total, which includes flights, hotel, and cruise. The inclusions provide good value.
